name: Outlook RSS Subscription File
summary: Learn about .OBI files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: OBI files are named using the convention <profilename>.sharing.xml.obi. They are typically located in the following user directory:AppData\​Local\​Microsoft\​Outlook.
OBI files can be exported to Outline Processor Markup Language (.OPML) files by selecting the following option in Outlook: File → Import and Export → Export all RSS feeds as OPML file.

description: File created by Microsoft Outlook, a calendar and email program; contains RSS subscription names and properties in an XML format; used to store RSS feed subscriptions for an outlook profile.
